fields.body:
Hi {{ proposal.speaker }}!

We are happy to accept the following proposal for PyArkansas 2018:

    {{ proposal.kind }}:
    {{ proposal.title }}

Important: *Please reply to this email to confirm that you can make it to PyArkansas 2018 and will present this session*

Notes:
 - Please do not share news of this acceptance publicly until we have published the complete session list. We will email and tweet when the list is published and you are encouraged to publicize your session at that time.
 - We are only scheduling one session per speaker so if you submitted other proposals you will be receiving "not accepted" emails for them once all other notifications are sent.
 - We will be sending more information and some speaker logistics in a later email.
 - All conference participants, including speakers must adhere to our code of conduct: https://pyohio.org/code-of-conduct/

Please let us know if you have any questions.

Congratulations and thanks!

-PyArkansas Organizers
fields.subject: Please read, confirmation needed: Your PyArkansas proposal has been accepted!
fields.label: Accepted

fields.body:
Dear {{ proposal.speaker }},

Thank you very much for taking the time to submit a proposal for PyArkansas 2018. Unfortunately this proposal was not selected for the PyArkansas 2018 schedule:

    {{ proposal.title }} [{{ proposal.kind }}]

We had room for ~40 sessions on the schedule and received *many* more quality proposals than we could accept.

We do hope you'll still attend PyArkansas! We'd like you to consider presenting about your topic as a 5-minute lightning talk or facilitating an Open Space discussion. Sign-ups for both will be on-site.

Thank you again for your submission.

-PyArkansas Organizers
fields.subject: PyArkansas proposal not accepted
fields.label: Not Accepted

fields.body:
Hello {{ proposal.speaker }},

Thank you for presenting at PyArkansas! Your hard work is what makes PyArkansas a great event. As you prepare your presentation, please review this important information about PyArkansas:

• Be sure to register as an attendee if you haven’t already. We need you to register in order to print badges correctly and to get an accurate count for refreshments: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/pyohio-2017-tickets-33066656259

• Please review our Code of Conduct. Everyone is required to follow the Code of Conduct and this includes your presentation & slide content. If you have any questions about this please email program@pyohio.org: http://pyohio.org/code-of-conduct/

• Find your talk on the lists:
  https://pyohio.org/schedule/talks/list/
  https://pyohio.org/schedule/tutorials/list/
  
• Verify that the title, description, and abstract are correct. Please note that if you make any further changes to your proposal they are not automatically copied over to the public listing. If you need changes to be applied, please email us. 

• Please consider readability when creating slides for your presentation. The following PyCon document has good guidelines for creating readable slides: https://github.com/PyCon/best-practices/blob/master/presentation_slides.md

• We are in the process of confirming the A/V hookups and projector dimensions and will email again once we have those.

• We will be finalizing the schedule soon and will email & tweet when it is ready.

• Please feel free to share the news of your session being selected and the link to your listing! On Twitter you can use the hashtag #PyArkansas and/or mention @PyArkansas.

Thanks again for speaking at PyArkansas! If you have any questions please reply to this email and let us know.

-The PyArkansas Organizers
fields.subject: Important PyArkansas Speaker Info
fields.label: Important Speaker Info

fields.body:
Hello {{ proposal.speaker }},

We have just a couple more updates for you:

• Presentation information:
   Slide size: 16:9 - 720p (1280×720)
   Preferred connections: HDMI, mini display port
   We have adapters for display port and VGA but these do not work with all systems. Please be sure to test your connection in the room beforehand if you're unsure of your setup.

• Speakers receive two parking passes (one for each day) for the garage that is adjacent to The Ohio Union. If you need them, please ask for them upon check-in at the registration desk. Parking garage info here:

  https://ohiounion.osu.edu/visit_the_union/garage_parking

Thanks again for presenting at PyArkansas! If you have any questions please reply to this email and let us know.

-The PyArkansas Organizers
fields.subject: Re: Important PyArkansas Speaker Logistics
fields.label: Speaker Info Follow-up

fields.body:
Dear {{ proposal.speaker }},

Thank you for your proposal. We received far more submissions than we could accommodate this year. Our program is nearly complete but we'd like to keep your submission on a waitlist in case space becomes available in the schedule:

    {{ proposal.title }} [{{ proposal.kind }}]

We will notify you immediately if a slot opens and this session is accepted or in the next couple weeks if it is no longer needed. If you would like to have this taken off the waitlist now please let us know.	
	
We do hope you'll attend PyArkansas either way! If the session is not scheduled we'd like you to consider presenting about your topic as a 5-minute lightning talk or facilitating an Open Space discussion. Sign-ups for both will be on-site.

Thank you again for your submission.

-PyArkansas Organizers
fields.subject: PyArkansas proposal waitlisted
fields.label: Waitlist
